Class User

  • java.lang.Object
    • User

  • public class User
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a user, with relevant properties associated. The first four bytes of user's representation is always the ID.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      java.net.InetAddress address
      IP address, as determined by the received packet.
      int dataPort
      User's port for sending data (TCP connections with Server Socket)
      int port
      User's port for receiving control messages.
      int userID
      User's unique identifier in the group
      java.lang.String username
      Public username

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      byte[] pack()
      Convert a User object into a byte array for transport over the wire.
      static User unpack(java.io.BufferedInputStream input)
      Create a user object from a stream of data
      static User unpackWithID(int userID, java.io.BufferedInputStream input)
      Unpack after already extracting ID
